name: ARCADIA (itch) (ARCAEON)
description:
Travel through puzzling levels as members of progressive metal band ARCAEON to find their sources of power, defeat an evil foe and ultimately gain access to their personal paradise. 

See Gameplay video for the music video for ARCADIA taken from ARCAEON's debut album, CASCADENCE, released 12/2\21. (Warning! Game spoilers in music video.) 

Music video link: 

Controls:

D-pad: Move character/Select menu item

A: Interact/Confirm menu item

B: Attack/'Back' button

Select: Show inventory

Gameboy->Keyboard  Controls:

Up - ArrowUP, w

Down - ArrowDown, s

Left - ArrowLeft, a

Right - ArrowRight, d

A - Alt, z, j

B - k, x

Start - Enter

Select - Shift
